name: openstack-contrail
summary: Juju solutions for OpenStack with Contrail
excerpt: Juju makes it easy to deploy OpenStack at scale. Quickly and reliably build an enterprise-scale cloud run on Ubuntu - the most popular operating system for OpenStack.

bundles.name: OpenStack Contrail
bundles.summary: This bundle deploys a basic OpenStack Cloud (Mitaka release) on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, configured to use OpenContrail, providing Dashboard, Compute, Network, Block Storage, Object Storage, Identity and Image services.
